instructions: Hi, thanks for participating in our experiment.
This experiment you will be presented with paragraphs to read one at a time. After each paragraph there will be a question to test your understanding.
There will be 2 types of paragraphs that will be presented randomly. One will be a standard paragraph to read the other will be one where each word is highlighted at a pace specified by you.
This experiement will consist of 12 paragraphs. After each question feel free to take a quick break 15-30s.

updated_paragraphs.text: Once upon a time in a quiet village nestled among rolling hills, there lived a young girl named Lily. She possessed a magical book that could bring her wildest dreams to life. One day, she decided to use the book to create a breathtaking garden filled with enchanted flowers that glowed in the moonlight. As the garden blossomed, it attracted visitors from far and wide, spreading happiness and wonder throughout the land.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Lily create with her magical book?

updated_paragraphs.text: In a bustling city, there was a street musician named Alex who played the violin with unmatched passion and skill. Every evening, he filled the streets with the hauntingly beautiful melodies of his music, bringing solace to the weary souls passing by. One night, a mysterious stranger approached him, offering a golden violin that could play music capable of healing hearts and mending broken spirits.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did the mysterious stranger offer to Alex?

updated_paragraphs.text: In a vibrant city, there was a talented street artist named Maya. She painted colorful murals that adorned the walls of the bustling streets, brightening the lives of passersby. One day, a renowned art gallery owner discovered her work and offered her a chance to showcase her art in a prestigious exhibition, propelling Maya's career to new heights.
updated_paragraphs.question: What opportunity did Maya receive that elevated her career as an artist?
possible_answers: A chance to perform on a street corner
A free supply of art materials
An invitation to a local art club
An opportunity to showcase her art in a prestigious exhibition

updated_paragraphs.text: Sarah stumbled upon a dusty old book in her attic, its pages filled with mysterious symbols. As she began to decipher the writing, she realized it contained a spell for time travel. With a mix of excitement and trepidation, she decided to try it, and in an instant, she found herself in the bustling streets of ancient Rome.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Sarah discover in her attic?

updated_paragraphs.text: Alex, a young scientist, embarked on an expedition to a remote jungle in search of a legendary, undiscovered species of butterfly. After weeks of searching, he finally spotted it, a magnificent butterfly with iridescent wings. Just as he was about to capture it for further study, he noticed a tribe of indigenous people watching him closely.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Alex discover in the remote jungle?

updated_paragraphs.text: Emily had always been fascinated by the night sky, and one clear evening, she decided to set up her telescope in the backyard. As she gazed at the stars, she noticed a bright, moving object streaking across the sky. It was a meteor, and it left a brilliant trail of light before disappearing. Emily made a wish upon the shooting star.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Emily see in the night sky?

updated_paragraphs.text: Jake, an avid gardener, had been nurturing a mysterious plant for years. It grew in an old, ornate pot and was rumored to bloom once a decade. One day, as he watered it, the plant suddenly sprouted vibrant, otherworldly flowers that emitted a mesmerizing fragrance. Jake was astounded by this unexpected development.
updated_paragraphs.question: What surprised Jake about the mysterious plant?
possible_answers: It grew tall and green leaves

updated_paragraphs.text: On a foggy morning, Lisa decided to explore the abandoned mansion at the edge of town. Inside, she discovered a dusty old mirror that, when she touched it, transported her to a magical realm filled with talking animals and enchanted forests. Lisa was in awe of the new world she had entered.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Lisa find inside the abandoned mansion?

updated_paragraphs.text: As Emily was walking through the forest, she stumbled upon a hidden waterfall. The water cascaded down from a rocky cliff into a crystal-clear pool. It was a serene and enchanting spot, one that Emily had never seen before in all her forest adventures.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Emily discover in the forest?

updated_paragraphs.text: Max and Mia decided to explore an old, abandoned amusement park rumored to be haunted. As they walked through the rusted gates, eerie laughter echoed in the distance. Suddenly, a ghostly figure appeared before them, causing Max and Mia to gasp in surprise.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Max and Mia encounter in the abandoned amusement park?

updated_paragraphs.text: Samantha was exploring an ancient forest when she stumbled upon a glowing, magical stone. When she touched it, she felt a surge of energy and found herself able to communicate with the animals of the forest. Samantha was overjoyed with her newfound ability and spent hours talking to her newfound friends.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Samantha discover in the ancient forest?

updated_paragraphs.text: Mark and Sarah were on a camping trip deep in the wilderness when they stumbled upon an old, abandoned cabin. Inside, they found a journal filled with intriguing sketches of strange creatures and symbols. As they flipped through the pages, they realized it belonged to a mysterious explorer who had disappeared without a trace.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Mark and Sarah find inside the abandoned cabin?
possible_answers: A journal with sketches of strange creatures and symbols

updated_paragraphs.text: Sarah always dreamed of becoming an astronaut, and one day, she received an acceptance letter from NASA. Her heart raced with excitement as she realized she would be part of a mission to explore Mars. Sarah knew that this opportunity was a once-in-a-lifetime chance to fulfill her lifelong dream.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Sarah receive in the mail that made her heart race with excitement?
possible_answers: A package from an online store
A bill from the electric company

updated_paragraphs.text: On a quiet afternoon, Lily decided to explore her grandmother's attic. Among the dusty old trunks and forgotten relics, she discovered a mysterious, locked chest. After searching for the key, Lily finally managed to open it and found a stack of letters tied with a ribbon. These letters contained heartfelt messages from her grandmother to her grandfather during their youth.
updated_paragraphs.question: What did Lily find in her grandmother's attic?

calibration_text: In a quaint village nestled between rolling hills, a mysterious carnival arrived overnight, bringing with it an air of enchantment. Curious townsfolk gathered to explore the whimsical attractions that seemed to defy the laws of nature. Amidst the colorful tents and captivating performances, they discovered that time inside the carnival moved differently, allowing for friendships to form, adventures to unfold, and memories to be made in a single magical night. As the dawn broke, the carnival disappeared, leaving behind cherished memories and a sense of wonder that would forever linger in their hearts.
